Package cs3500.freecell.view

Class FreecellTextView

    public class FreecellTextView
extends java.lang.Object
implements FreecellView
    Represents the view of the Freecell game.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from interface: FreecellView
        Return the present state of the game as a string. The string is formatted as follows: 
         F1:[b]f11,[b]f12,[b],...,[b]f1n1[n] (Cards in foundation pile 1 in order)
 F2:[b]f21,[b]f22,[b],...,[b]f2n2[n] (Cards in foundation pile 2 in order)
 ...
 Fm:[b]fm1,[b]fm2,[b],...,[b]fmnm[n] (Cards in foundation pile m in
 order)
 O1:[b]o11[n] (Cards in open pile 1)
 O2:[b]o21[n] (Cards in open pile 2)
 ...
 Ok:[b]ok1[n] (Cards in open pile k)
 C1:[b]c11,[b]c12,[b]...,[b]c1p1[n] (Cards in cascade pile 1 in order)
 C2:[b]c21,[b]c22,[b]...,[b]c2p2[n] (Cards in cascade pile 2 in order)
 ...
 Cs:[b]cs1,[b]cs2,[b]...,[b]csps (Cards in cascade pile s in order)

 where [b] is a single blankspace, [n] is newline. Note that there is no
 newline on the last line
        Specified by:
        toString in interface FreecellView
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the formatted string as above

      • renderBoard

        public void renderBoard()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: FreecellView
        Render the board to the provided data destination. The board should be rendered exactly in the format produced by the toString method above
        Specified by:
        renderBoard in interface FreecellView
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if transmission of the board to the provided data destination fails

      • renderMessage

        public void renderMessage​(java.lang.String message)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: FreecellView
        Render a specific message to the provided data destination.
        Specified by:
        renderMessage in interface FreecellView
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be transmitted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if transmission of the board to the provided data destination fails
